website_summaries.verdict: Well-performing, space-saving solution with center door design. Perfect for smaller bathrooms.
pros: Features a full-length magnetic strip closure to eliminate water escaping
Center opening door allows generous entry
cons: Some users found the aluminum slightly flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Much Better in person!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. This is a great shower for small spaces where you don’t have room to open a door. It looks way better in person than I thought it would and it was relatively easy to install. You need two strong people to install it though.
customer_reviews.author: Nort

customer_reviews.title: Nice item and nice idea
customer_reviews.text: Okay you have a "winner" here. Overall this is an excellent product. And I'd happily buy another, if I had someplace to put it. One drawer back - looking at the unit of similar style. I think your price is about $50 to high. You should have a discount sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install /Excellent space saver!
customer_reviews.text: The install went pretty well,You need a 2nd person to assist. This is a secondary bathroom so for a small space this is very good. Doors slide from the corners and lock in place with magnets. When you exit shower you can keep doors open for added elbow room in the bathroom. takes a little time to level doors for proper mating and alignment. Glass is good quality. there is some coating on it that I guess is for water spots. I will update any long term issues in the future. Would give 5 stars if the glass was thicker!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Long

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Took two of us about 45 minutes to install the enclosure. Very happy with it and how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Works well.  A little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower. A little over priced but great nonetheless. The magnetic doors don't come perfectly together. When the doors close, it will either be slightly open at the top seal or at the bottom. I adjusted it so the top is slightly open since no water should get up there and leak out. Other than that, it looks AWESOME in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lo-Brau

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: The metal is very thin and light. After I open the box, the legs were already bent and dents on the door panel. Because the metal is soft, you can easily bend the legs back straight. I think this product is weak. It may only last about a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Leung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was worth the price. Saved us over $800 from having a profession installer do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Great shower enclosure for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Great shower enclosure for small spaces. My husband install it and it did take some skill and knowledge to level the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The shower was a great product and very sturdy. The look was very modern and added a great deal of style to a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Good enclosure, some minor parts missing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good shower enclosure. Only problem was that a couple of hardware parts were missing, and the process of ordering the missing parts from Dreamline was overly complicated because they could not find a record of my Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wann

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the base is specifically for double door opening. Otherwise it does not work.
customer_reviews.text: It is more space than the half-round type. The double doors opening is very convenient, specially in tight space.
customer_reviews.author: wang lee

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Home Depot, not Amazon, but wanted to leave a review since there weren't many reviews when I was looking in to this product. We have a very small master bathroom that was not functional. The previous shower stall was too small and couldn't open all of the way due to the door hitting the toilet. We couldn't add any square footage to the room so we bought these shower doors and installed them over a custom tiled base. These doors have finally allowed our bathroom to be functional. Highly recommend this product in small bathrooms where you don't have room for door swing clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Bonescbw

product_meta.title: DreamLine Cornerview 34 1/2 in. D x 34 1/2 in. W x 72 in. H Framed Sliding Shower Enclosure in Chrome, SHEN-8134340-01
product_meta.description:
The DreamLine Cornerview sliding shower enclosure provides a modern solution to maximize space with a corner installation and center opening design. The Cornerview has a straight edged style that provides a comfortable showering space. The Cornerview can fit into virtually any corner, making it perfect for smaller bathrooms. Instantly upgrade the look and feel of your bath space with the Cornerview sliding shower enclosure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DreamLine Cornerview sliding shower enclosure provides a modern solution to maximize space with a corner installation and center opening design. The Cornerview has a straight edged style that provides a comfortable showering space. The Cornerview can fit into virtually any corner, making it perfect for smaller bathrooms. Instantly upgrade the look and feel of your bath space with the Cornerview sliding shower enclosure. Choose DreamLine for the ultimate solution for your shower project. NOTE: DreamLine shower bases will always be larger (approximately 2 in.) than the corresponding DreamLine shower enclosures/doors. Please, take this information under advisement when ordering your shower base and shower enclosure separately.
feature_bullets: Model Size: 34 1/2 in. D x 34 1/2 in. W x 72 in. H; Walk-in Opening: 20 3/4 in.
Two sliding panels, with two stationary panels on sides meet to create corner walk through
Anodized aluminum wall profiles allow up to 1/2 in. adjustment per side for out-of-plumb (uneven walls)
5/32 in. (4 mm) thick certified clear tempered glass; Hardware Finish: Chrome
Perfect for smaller spaces where a swing door will not work
IMPORTANT! All measurements should be taken only AFTER walls are finished (tile, acrylic back walls, etc.)
Optional matching SlimLine shower base available: Model DLT-1036360 (sold separately)
Perfect for smaller spaces where a swing door will not work. Center opening sliding door design allows generous entry area
Full length magnetic strip. Profiles allow up to 1/2 in. adjustment per side for out-of-plumb. 34.5 in. D x 34.5 in. W x 72 in. H
Walk-In opening: 20 3/4; Two 16 3/4 in. glass panels; 5/32 in. (4mm) ANSI certified clear tempered glass. Framed glass design. Chrome Finish
Optional matching SlimLine shower base available: Model DLT-1036360 (sold separately)
IMPORTANT! All measurements should be taken only AFTER walls are finished. Professional installation recommended. Limited Lifetime Warranty
